channel.title: Different Characters
channel.description: I had a idea where like, when you start, you could start off as a mage, ranger, or warrior. Is there any way I can have those options when you start the game, and you can only be that kind for the rest of the game UNLESS you talk to the owner or a NPC

item.title: Different Characters
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

For the JDK problem, if you have this for a compiler. Replace it with this:

@echo off title RicScape Client Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

That is if you have JDK 3. IF you have a different version change the number after the last 0

So if you have JDK 2, it would look like this

[code]@echo off title RicScape Client Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]

LINK TO WILDS PLAY: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,239916.0.html

Just keep searching and experimenting until you get it!

Read full topic
